text: Calcutta is a 1947 American crime thriller movie directed by John Farrow and starring Alan Ladd, Gail Russell, William Bendix, June Duprez, Lowell Gilmore, Benson Fong, Edith King. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 crime movies Category:1947 thriller movies Category:1940s American crime thriller movies Category:Movies directed by John Farrow Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies set in India
title: Calcutta (1947 movie)
